content: [Hi! If you see a warning at the top of the topic, know this is a false accusation of scam, using his authority LoyceV with his friends created this false flag, more about the situation here - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5406606.0I ask everyone who is not indifferent to the situation to press the button "Oppose" -https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;flag=3009 ]I want to exchange 100 USTC (US Terra) for USDT.100 USTC = 100 USDT, so you get 100 USTC. I prefer USDT only TRC20, but am willing to get other crypto - BTC, TRX

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: I'm ready to sell you 100 USTC for 50 USDT. Would you buy that? I can do some discount as well if you buy a bigger amount. Let me know if you want to buy that. You can PM me anytime here or in my telegram group but make sure you are willing to accept escrow. I will pay the escrow fee + some commision too.

I prefer USDT only TRC20, but am willing to get other crypto - BTC, TRX".First, here is the amount of what I want to EXCHANGE: "I want to exchange 100 USTC (US Terra)";Secondly, it indicates what and for what I EXCHANGE: "for USDT.";Thirdly, how much does this volume of EXCHANGE cost: "100 USTC = 100 USDT";Fourthly, what will he receive, the one who agrees to the EXCHANGE: "so you get 100 USTC."Fifth, what type of EXCHANGE network do I prefer and which coins can I EXCHANGE: "I prefer USDT only TRC20, but am willing to get other crypto - BTC, TRX".You know that these are exchange conditions, why write about scam?

I prefer USDT only TRC20, but am willing to get other crypto - BTC, TRX".First, here is the amount of what I want to EXCHANGE: "I want to exchange 100 USTC (US Terra)";Secondly, it indicates what and for what I EXCHANGE: "for USDT.";Thirdly, how much does this volume of EXCHANGE cost: "100 USTC = 100 USDT";Fourthly, what will he receive, the one who agrees to the EXCHANGE: "so you get 100 USTC."Fifth, what type of EXCHANGE network do I prefer and which coins can I EXCHANGE: "I prefer USDT only TRC20, but am willing to get other crypto - BTC, TRX".You know that these are exchange conditions, why write about scam?USTC value is currently $0.044 So 100 USTC = $4.4When you write that 100 USTC = 100 USDT, you are simply writing untrue.In the same way, you could write 100 DOGE = 100 USDT. This is obviously a lie. You have been informed about it before, so you do it with full awareness, which means that your intentions are not good. In other words, you're hoping someone will be stupid and you will scam him. Thats why it is scam behavior.Is it clear enough now?
